Package com.gigya.socialize.android

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GSPermissionResultHandler
    Interface for listening to permission requests responses.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GSAPI
    The central class of the Gigya Android SDK.
    GSPluginFragment
    GSPluginFragment is a custom fragment that renders Gigya JS Plugins and integrates them seamlessly with the Gigya Android SDK.
    GSSession
    Wraps a Gigya session returned from the OAuth2 version of the login process
    GSWebBridge
    GSWebBridge connects between the Gigya JavaScript SDK and the Gigya Android SDK.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GSAPI.LoginBehavior
    An enum specifying the desired login behavior.
